alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Aroostook County through 615 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Eagle Lake, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eagle Lake, Woodland, Madawaska Lake, New Sweden, Perham, Wade, Stockholm, Winterville and Westmanland. This includes State Highway 11 near Winterville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
